__e: But the truth of his handicap... lay only in a mind both exalted and crippled by too many stories... and the path he chose to become one.
Guns work. Butyou were paralyzed by a gun!
When Lisa came to us, she was paralyzed by guilt.
Oh, right. You don't remember she's paralyzed and can't stand out of her wheelchair.
Well, he picked up the lamb and took it back to the fold.
Her legs are fully paralysed and her arms are on their way.
You fuckers won't be able to move for a year.
They're drowning us. We'll be swamped for months.
The next morning... he says that he can't get out of bed - his legs are cramped, he can't walk.
